title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: " The gardens of the Dominicans surrounded themonastery on all sides, and were of great extent andbeauty. Part of them immediately adjoined the NorthIncli, and covered all that space of ground now occupied by Atholl Place, the Crescent, and RoseTerrace, besides a considerable extent of ground tothe west and south, still known by the name of theBlack Friars.
